item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
WoW: Yep, Raven Hill cemetery in Duskwood
LOTRO: Yep again, Weathertop in the Lone-Lands. I didn't have the nads to snoop around, maybe I'll do that today before Beta Lights Out. Not like I have an undefeated title to protect on my characters anymore. (Thanks, random dude in the Barrows!)
item.content:encoded:
WoW: Yep, Raven Hill cemetery in Duskwood

LOTRO: Yep again, Weathertop in the Lone-Lands. I didn’t have the nads to snoop around, maybe I’ll do that today before Beta Lights Out. Not like I have an undefeated title to protect on my characters anymore. (Thanks, random dude in the Barrows!)

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description:
<blockquote>90% chance that "steven" has never read through the archives. Yup, this is the definitive tips site for hunters</blockquote>
Well this wasn't the definitive WoW widows spot either... "looks at old post with a few hundred replies"

item.title: By: steven
item.dc:creator: steven
item.description:
Foton, I purchased LOTRO a couple of weeks ago and I am awaiting the box to arrive. I plan on playing the champion class, maybe a hunter (I'm already a hunter in WOW).
What tid bits of knowledge would you have for a newbie LOTRO player? What are some of the do's and don'ts ?
item.content:encoded:
Foton,
I purchased LOTRO a couple of weeks ago and I am awaiting the box to arrive. I plan on playing the champion class, maybe a hunter (I’m already a hunter in WOW).

What tid bits of knowledge would you have for a newbie LOTRO player? What are some of the do’s and don’ts ?

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description: Weathertop. Nice little area to snoop around.
item.content:encoded: Weathertop. Nice little area to snoop around.

item.title: By: J
item.dc:creator: J
item.description: WoW shot: that's Duskwood, the entrance to the graveyard where Morbent Fel lives. I forget the name of the abandoned town nearby.
item.content:encoded: WoW shot: that’s Duskwood, the entrance to the graveyard where Morbent Fel lives. I forget the name of the abandoned town nearby.
